bug.author: helloahn
bug.summary: [TF-Lite/Minor Bug] a minor error occured with new tensorflow-lite-dev package
bug.description:
With new tensorflow-lite-dev package from launchpad, below error is detected.
nnapi error: unable to open library libneuralnetworks.so
When I confronted with this error in the past, the version of tensorflow was too low(<1.9). However, please check my environment. $ sudo dpkg -l | grep tensorflow ii tensorflow-dev 1.9.0-0~201810220136~ubuntu16.04.1 amd64 Tensorflow development headers and object file ii tensorflow-lite-dev 1.9.0-0~201810220136~ubuntu16.04.1 amd64 Tensorflow Lite development headers and object file When I use the previous version(still 1.9, but the old package) the error has not appeared like below. $ sudo dpkg -l | grep tensorflow ii tensorflow-dev 1.9.0-0~201810220136~ubuntu16.04.1 amd64 Tensorflow development headers and object file ii tensorflow-lite-dev 1.9.0 amd64 Tensorflow Lite development headers and object file

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/694>#694</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
Do you still have the issue? Otherwise, please give us more info.
